Entries.default: The dog gives a single, quiet whine. Its stub of a tail wags excitedly.
"Do you know where Eothas is, boy?"
The dog continues to gaze up at you, panting.

"Well, don't worry about it, then."

Ed√©r scratches the dog's neck and gives it a couple pats.
The dog narrows its eyes contentedly as you pat it for a few moments.
